item.title: Nifty Reclaims 25,000; Piyush Goyal Says 'First Tranche' Of US-India Trade Deal Likely By November
item.description: Markets remained firm for the seventh consecutive day, with selective buying in energy, media, and financials. Analyst calls pointed to caution in the...

item.title: India To Develop High-Grade Auto Steel To Reduce Import Dependence: Minister Kumaraswamy
item.description: The steel industry faces pressure from cheap Chinese imports flooding the market

item.title: Relief Rally: Aurobindo Pharma Surges After Zentiva Twist; SEBI Analyst Recommends Short-Term Buy
item.description: With debt worries off the table, stock gained on short covering and retail bullish sentiment. An analyst sets upside targets of ₹1,190–₹1,250.

item.title: Apple Slapped With Downgrade On 'No Significant AI Innovation' — Stock Eyes Recovery After 4-Day Slide
item.description: Phillip Securities downgraded Apple to 'Reduce' from 'Neutral' with an unchanged price target of $200 following this week's product event.

item.title: Crypto Play Figure Tech Rakes In Over $787M From IPO — Retail Expects Strong Debut
item.description: It priced its IPO at $25 per share, which exceeded the $20-$22 price range communicated by the company earlier.
